thread.title: David J in Kansas City
thread.title_full: Evermine reviewed by David J in Kansas City

author: David J in Kansas City
title: David J in Kansas City
text: Evermine was pretty awesome in sending out free address labels as they advertised. It wasn't just a gimmick and as I'm in housing temporarily while searching for a permanent address, I needed some address labels but didn't want to spend a lot of money knowing they would be useless in a few weeks. They actually delivered as promised! No recurring bill charges, no over the top marketing pressure. Just a high quality product delivered as promised! As a result I will be using them for printing needs going forward. It was a great way to introduce a new customer to Evermine. You've sold me! I'll be a customer from now on!
